metadata.title: CVE-2021-38084 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the POP3 component of Courier Mail Server before 1.1.5. Meddler-in-the-middle attackers can pipeline commands after the POP3 STLS command, injecting plaintext commands into an encrypted user session.

criterions.comment: courier package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
